mods.abstract: The Eddy Arnold Show #106, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, Vic Willis and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
